ygData.subject: Re: Re: interesting tagline
ygData.msgSnippet: It is an ancient Chinese curse.  Also the title of a Terry Pratchett book which plays on the ancient Chinese curse theme.  In a funny way.  The irony I
ygData.messageBody:
It is an ancient Chinese curse. Also the title of a Terry Pratchett book
which plays on the ancient Chinese curse theme. In a funny way. The irony
I perceived in the tagline was probably because I had read that funny book!


>
>From: "Sean Kennedy" <orang@...>
>
>I always heard it was an ancient chinese curse.
>
> >From: "Tom Henschel" <tomhenschel@...>
> >
> >A little Pratchett?
> >
> >
> >>
> >>From: Jason Rochelle <Jasroc@...>
> >>
> >><snip>
> >> >Btw got a lizardscale cloak from a friend last Sunday! Very nice item!
> >> >May you live in Interesting times,
> >>
> >>Are you aware this quote is meant to be a curse?
> >>
> >> >Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe
> >> >L23 in Highhold Keep, Xegony
